.. automodule:: strym


Class :code:`strym`
=============================

Import ``strym`` as::

    from strym import strym
    
for real-time visualization of CAN data when comma.ai Panda devices is plugged to system via USB. Currently deprecated in favor of libpanda_.

.. autoclass:: strym
    :members:
    
    
.. _libpanda: https://jmscslgroup.github.io/libpanda/
